alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 9:03PM CDT until July 01 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN...NORTHWESTERN ELLSWORTH AND NORTHEASTERN RUSSELL COUNTIES... At 903 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Wilson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Wilson, Lucas, Sylvan Grove, Wilson Lake and Wilson State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
